title: "Making self-driving cars safer through keener robot perception"
excerpt: "Safety concerns have clouded the future of fully autonomous vehicles. To accelerate their progress, MIT graduate student Heng “Hank” Yang and colleagues have developed a set of algorithms to help protect self-driving vehicles and other road users."
